@graph.rdfs:comment: Describes the class of all GeoProperties in IUDX. The range of a geo-property are objects describing geo-coordinates (e.g., latitude, longitude, GeoJSON objects etc.)
@graph.rdfs:label: GeoProperty

@graph.rdfs:comment: Describes the class of all properties in IUDX that have a complex JSON structures and cannot be described using simple strings and native data types.
@graph.rdfs:label: StructuredProperty

@graph.rdfs:comment: Describes the class of all properties in IUDX that have a complex JSON structures and cannot be described using simple strings and native data types.
@graph.rdfs:label: StructuredProperty
